content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. I see you might need some plumbing help. Could I get your name to start scheduling an appointment?
Thanks, Mike! What's the address where you need the plumbing service?
Thanks for the address, Mike. Let me verify that we're able to provide service at that location.
Great news! We do provide service in your area. When would be the ideal time for our plumbing team to come by and assist you?
Honestly, I'm really busy this whole month. I don't think I'll be able to schedule anything right now.
I understand, Mike. It sounds like this month is quite hectic for you. Would you like me to keep your contact details on file and reach out to you next month to schedule?
No, that's okay. Maybe I'll reach out when I have more time.
Understood, Mike. If you need us in the future, just let us know. Have a great day!
